description: Strengthening Sustainable Environment and Natural Resource Management, Climate Change Adaptation and Mitigation in Uganda

subproject.description: The project is linked to CPAP 2010-2014 Outcome 2.3. It will focus on strengthening the efforts and capavities of local governments, CSOs and communities to sustainably manage and utilise natural resources, integrate climate change adaptation and mitigation in their activities and build climate change resilience.
subproject.title: PILOT INTIATIVES 4 ENV.& CC

title: Strengthen SENR & CCA/ M
